# Connecting via USB

## Converting RAW Images: FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO

- Before proceeding, select **USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE** for **PC CONNECTION SETTING > PC CONNECTION MODE** in the camera menus.
- FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO can be used to convert RAW images to JPEG or TIFF images.

!PC Connection Mode Menu

> üí° **For more information on FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO, see ‚ÄúSoftware for Use with Your Camera‚Äù (p. 291).**

## Backing up and Restoring Camera Settings (FUJIFILM X Acquire)

- Before proceeding, select **USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE** for **PC CONNECTION SETTING > PC CONNECTION MODE** in the camera menus.
- FUJIFILM X Acquire can be used to backup and restore camera settings.

!PC Connection Mode Menu

> üí° **For more information on FUJIFILM X Acquire, see ‚ÄúSoftware for Use with Your Camera‚Äù (p. 291).**
